title: Not Alone
description: You're walking home late at night on the streets with a serial killer on the loose.

title: Midnight Visitor
description: In this detective horror game, solve a murder mystery within a haunted house.

title: Dead Inside
description: A short horror experience about being stranded inside your house stuck in a time loop.

title: Captive
description: Silence your fears, and outwit the killer in 'Captive'â€”where survival is your only escape, and every step could be your last.

title: Silent House
description: In the chilling depths of Silent House, survival is the only melody as you navigate the haunting echoes of a PS1-style nightmare.

title: Night Watch
description: Your objective in Night Watch is to carefully observe the live feeds from various cameras placed strategically throughout the location.

title: Heart Quake
description: Heart Quake is first person shooter with 1-bit graphics developed in 3 days for Winter MelonJam 2023. Recieved Honorable Mention

title: The Outer Limits
description: A horror game inspired by Iron Lung made in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.2 Ranked #87 Overall & #35, #43 in Graphics & Innovation.

title: Echoes of Fear (Prototype)
description: Echoes of Fear is a realistic first person shooter game, You're tasked with rescuing all the hostages. But not everything is as what it seems.

title: Welcome To The Dark Web
description: You just joined your new job as the deep web moderator.

title: Hotel Nightmare
description: Hotel Nightmare is a short horror game inspired by IMSCARED.

title: The night of '87
description: A PSX horror game featuring a lot of zombies.
